Hotel.name: Sure Hotel by Best Western Gare du Nord (Formerly Faubourg)

Description.Text:
Property Location
With a stay at Hotel Faubourg 216-224 in Paris (Gare du Nord - Gare de L'Est), you'll be close to Place de la Bataille-de-Stalingrad and Louvre Museum. This family-friendly hotel is close to Notre Dame Cathedral and Arc de Triomphe.

Rooms
Make yourself at home in one of the 58 guestrooms featuring refrigerators and LCD televisions. Satellite television is provided for your entertainment. Conveniences include phones, as well as safes and desks.

Dining
Quench your thirst with your favorite drink at a bar/lounge. Breakfast is available for a fee.

Business, Other Amenities
Featured amenities include express check-in, express check-out, and dry cleaning/laundry services.


Pets allowed Check-in time starts at 2 PM Check-out time is noon
Quench your thirst with your favorite drink at a bar/lounge. Breakfast is available for a fee.
Extra-person charges may apply and vary depending on hotel policy.
Government-issued photo identification and a credit card or cash deposit are required at check-in for incidental charges.
Special requests are subject to availability upon check-in and may incur additional charges. Special requests cannot be guaranteed.
  • No onsite parking is available.


Make yourself at home in one of the 58 guestrooms featuring refrigerators and LCD televisions. Satellite television is provided for your entertainment. Conveniences include phones, as well as safes and desks.

The preferred airport for Hotel Faubourg 216-224 is Paris (CDG-Roissy-Charles de Gaulle).

You must present a photo ID when checking in. Your credit card is charged at the time you book. Bed type and smoking preferences are not guaranteed.Your reservation is prepaid and is guaranteed for late arrival. The total charge includes all room charges and taxes, as well as fees for access and booking. Any incidental charges such as parking, phone calls, and room service will be handled directly between you and the property.

The preferred airport for Hotel Faubourg 216-224 is Paris (CDG-Charles de Gaulle) - 18.8 km / 11.7 mi.
